name: AfterMath - Multiplayer FPS
description: E-Sports Capable Multiplayer Game developed in Unreal Engine and hosted through AWS with AAA Multiplayer Features like Server Side Prediction, etc.

name: HackTheConsole - Console Games
description: Games made on the Console / Terminal to get the nostalgic feeling of playing retro games like Metroidvania, Mario and others.

name: NegProt's Engine 2D
description: A Custom 2D Engine to make platformer games of 90s Mario Style. With full fledged ECS, Animation System and Level Editor .

name: Unreal Wordle
description: Highly optimized implementation of the Wordle Game Pattern Matching Algorithm in Unreal Engine

name: Hospital Registration Portal
description: Hospital Registration Portal developed specifically for Hathidah Health Care, an integrated unit of Health Care. Data syncing across large distances and hosted on cloud.

name: Arkham Batman Takedown Combat
description: Combat System Inspired by Arkham Knight Series' Freeflow Combat.

name: Tower One - Tower Defense
description: A Single Player Tower Defence game inspired by Plants vs Zombies by with a twist of there being only one movable tower.

name: Real Time Communication for Specially Abled
description: Assist people with disabilities by the AI/ML and significantly improving their ability to get around and participate in daily activities.

name: Kwiz Game - Quizzing Platform
description: Inspired by Quizizz Platform. Easy to Setup, Maintain and Retrieve results architecture. Gamified for smooth experience.
